name: 蔡佩珊
objective:
本課程之目標為：充實生活技能、提升科技素養、豐富生活內涵、培養繼續進修之興趣與能力，以奠定終身學習及生涯發展之基礎。
This course is designed to help student to learn another skill, better understand technology, enrich there live and inspire their interests for further study.
